name: Water Hydroxide Travelus Reborns HD
description:
Long ago alchemists sought the philosopher's stone, but only one found an incomplete version. He used its power to take over the world, but one day a legendary warrior sealed him in another dimension.

Nowadays an evil organization plans to bring the evil alchemist back, the calculator god starts to gather a group of weirdos with powers to prevent the destruction of the universe.

Key Features:

- Classic J-RPG style

- About 8 hours of average playtime

- A weird story

- Travel between various cities using an electric train

- Original assets

- 14 unique characters to choose from

- English and spanish
